name: rankvaln
body: |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls))

stmt.origin: sylnbir(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cdm(crnk)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wcel(c0, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls))

-| wi(wn(wcel(c0, cdm(crnk))), wceq(cfv(crnk, c0), emptycls))
body.pretty:
⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)→(rank ` c0)= ∅)
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(rank)↔ c0 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))
⊣ (¬ c0 ∈ dom(rank)→(rank ` c0)= ∅)

comment: Value of the rank function at a non-well-founded set. (The antecedent is always false under Foundation, by ~ unir1 , unless ` A ` is a proper class.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2013.)
